summary.para: Notifies the language bar of a change in a language bar item.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: Contains a set of flags that indicate changes in the language bar item. This can be a combination of one or more of the TF_LBI_* values.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

remarks.para: A language bar item should call this method when the internal state of the item changes. TSF will update the language bar user interface appropriately.

summary.para: The ITfLangBarItemSink interface is implemented by the language bar and used by a language bar item provider to notify the language bar of changes to a language bar item.
The language bar item provider obtains an instance of this interface when the language bar calls the provider's with identifier IID_ITfLangBarItemSink.
